price: 45. Weydii kuwaa ka midka ah Rusushayada aan soo dirnay hortaa: Ma waxaan yeellay Raxmaanka (Allaah) ka sokow ilaahyo la caabudo ?
arabic: وَسۡـَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَآ أَجَعَلۡنَا مِن دُونِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ ءَالِهَةٗ يُعۡبَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wasal man arsalnā min qablika min rusulinā ajaʿalnā min dūni al-raḥmāni ālihatan yuʿ'badūna
